actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prevent the disclosure of confidential information in the Senate advise and consent process.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to impose penalties on: (1) a Senator or Senate officer or employee who discloses to any unauthorized party any information from a Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) background investigation relating to a presidential nomination for Federal office; and (2) anyone who knowingly solicits or receives such information from a Senator or Senate officer or employee. Amends the Privacy Act to make it applicable to FBI background investigations and reports relating to presidential nominations for Federal office.

titles.title: A bill to prevent the disclosure of confidential information in the Senate advise and consent process.
